Library.Description: This is a description of the AcmeSoft Foo API, as a whole. This content would probably be much more extensive, in real life. This paragraph is just placeholder text, for show.

Interface.name: IFoo
Interface.Short: short description of the IFoo interface
Interface.Description: This is a long description of the IFoo interface. Interesting, eh? Doesn't it look good with its bold and italic highlights? Why does this interface exist? Who would use it, and how? Nobody cares... it's imaginary. This text is only here to get a feel for how this tool's final output will look.
Interface.WhenToCall: The system uses this interface to access your object's fooness -- applications typically do not call this interface directly.
Interface.WhenToImpl: This interface must be implemented on all objects that support fooness.

Method.name: Foo
Method.Short: short description of the Foo method
Method.Description: This is a long description of the Foo method.

Parameters.Parameter: this string must be set to "Hello, World!"

Method.ReturnValue: This method can return all kinds of silly HRESULTs -- nobody cares.

Method.name: CreateBar
Method.Short: short description of the CreateBar method
Method.Description: This is a long description of the CreateBar method.

Parameters.Parameter: pointer to the newly created Bar object

Method.ReturnValue: This method can return all kinds of silly HRESULTs -- nobody cares.

CoClass.name: Foo
CoClass.Short: This is a short description of the Foo coclass.
CoClass.Description: This is a long description of the Foo coclass. What does it do? Who would use it? When? Why should anyone care? How is it implemented? Yadda yadda yadda...
CoClass.HowToInstantiate: Objects of type Foo can be instantiated directly, via its CLSID or ProgID.

CoClass.name: Bar
CoClass.Short: This is a short description of the Bar coclass.
CoClass.Description: This is a long description of the Bar coclass. What does it do? Who would use it? When? Why should anyone care? How is it implemented? Yadda yadda yadda...
CoClass.HowToInstantiate: Objects of type Bar cannot be be instantiated directly. They are obtained via the IFoo::CreateBar method.
